msItem.title: Dawit “Psalter”
msItem.rubric:
Nomina sacra (name of St. Mary in Texts I-4, I-5); titles and numbers of the Pss., Canticles and Songs; title of Texts I-2, I-3 and I-5; title and incipit of the daily readings of Text I-4; name of the Hebrew letters in Ps. 118; letter እ in the word እስመ in Ps. 135; letters ስ and ሕ in the word ስብሕዎ in Ps. 148; letters ስ and ሕ in the word ስብሕዎ in Ps. 150; etters ባ and ክ of the word ይባርክዎ in Canticle 10; elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
A group of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1 and I-4.

listBibl.bibl: Uppsala O Etiop. 1 (16th cent.), fols. 1r-193r (LöfUpp 31, no. 4);
BritMus Orient. 12467 (1660), fols. 8r-129r (StrBritLib 22, no. 17 [s. also nos. 18-25]);
JRyM Ethiopian 5 (18th cent.), fols. 4r-163vb (StrJRyM 7-9, no. 5 and pl. 8).

msItem.note: The Ethiopic Psalter usually includes: I) Mäzmurä Dawit "Psalms of David"; II) Mäḥalǝyä näbiyat "The Canticles of the Prophets"; III) Mäḥalǝyä mäḥalǝy "Song of Songs"; IV) Wǝddase Maryam “Glory of Mary”; V) Anqäṣä bǝrhan “The Gate of Light”. The Anqäṣä bǝrhan is missing in the Ms.

msItem.title: I) Mäzmurä Dawit “Psalms of David”
msItem.rubric:
Nomina sacra (name of St. Mary in Texts I-4, I-5); titles and numbers of the Pss., Canticles and Songs; title of Texts I-2, I-3 and I-5; title and incipit of the daily readings of Text I-4; name of the Hebrew letters in Ps. 118; letter እ in the word እስመ in Ps. 135; letters ስ and ሕ in the word ስብሕዎ in Ps. 148; letters ስ and ሕ in the word ስብሕዎ in Ps. 150; etters ባ and ክ of the word ይባርክዎ in Canticle 10; elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
A group of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1 and I-4.
msItem.incipit: Fol. 2r, l.1: ፍካሬ፡ ዘጻድቃን፡ ወዘኃጥን[sic] ። መዝሙር፡ ዘዳዊት። ብፁዕ፡ ብእሲ፡ ዘኢሖረ፡ በምክረ፡ ረሲዓን፨Interpretation of the righteous and of the sinful. Psalms of David. Ps. 1:1.
msItem.explicit: Fol. 116r, l.12: አንሰ፡ ነሣእኩ፡ እምውስተ፡ ፈለግ፡ ሰለሥተ፡ አዕባነ፨ ወጸፍክዎ፡ ውስተ፡ ፍጽሙ፡ ወወድቀ፨ ወአዲ፡ ነሣእኩ፡ ዘእምላዕሌሁ፡ ሰይፈ፨ ወመተርኩ፡ ርእሶ፨ ወአሰስልኩ[sic] ፡ ፅእለተ፡ እምደቂቀ፡ እስራኤል፨Ps. 151:7.

listBibl.bibl: Uppsala O Etiop. 1 (16th cent.), fols. 1r-193r (LöfUpp 31, no. 4);
BritMus Orient. 12467 (1660), fols. 8r-129r (StrBritLib 22, no. 17 [s. also nos. 18-25]);
JRyM Ethiopian 5 (18th cent.), fols. 4r-126r (StrJRyM 7-9, no. 5 and pl. 8).

msItem.title: II) Mäḫalǝyä näbiyat “The Canticles of the Prophets”
msItem.rubric:
Nomina sacra (name of St. Mary in Texts I-4, I-5); titles and numbers of the Pss., Canticles and Songs; title of Texts I-2, I-3 and I-5; title and incipit of the daily readings of Text I-4; name of the Hebrew letters in Ps. 118; letter እ in the word እስመ in Ps. 135; letters ስ and ሕ in the word ስብሕዎ in Ps. 148; letters ስ and ሕ in the word ስብሕዎ in Ps. 150; etters ባ and ክ of the word ይባርክዎ in Canticle 10; elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
A group of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1 and I-4.
msItem.incipit: Fol. 116r, l.7: ማኅልየ፡ ነቢያት፡ ወጸሎቱ፡ ለሙሴ። ንሴብሖ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ ስቡሐ፡ ዘተሰብሐ፨ ፈረሰ፡ ወመስተፅነ[sic] ፡ ወረወ፡ ውስተ፡ ባሕር።
msItem.explicit: Fol. 128v, l.1: እስመ፡ ርእያ፡ አዕይንትየ፡ አድኅኖተከ፨ ዘአስተዳሎኩ፡ ቅድመ፡ ኲሉ፡ ሕዝብከ፨ ከመ፡ ትክስት፡ ብርሃነ፡ ለአሕዛብ፨

listBibl.bibl: Uppsala O Etiop. 1 (16th cent.), fols. 193v-212r (LöfUpp 31, no. 4);
BritMus Orient. 12467 (1660), fols. 129v-142v (StrBritLib 22, no. 17 [s. also nos. 18-25]);
JRyM Ethiopian 5 (18th cent.), fols. 126r-138v (StrJRyM 7-9, no. 5 and pl. 8).

msItem.note: First Song of Moses (Ex. 15:1–19): fols. 116r-117r; Second Song of Moses (Deut. 32:1–21): fols. 117r-118v; Third Song of Moses (Deut. 32:22–43): fols. 118v-120r; Song of Hannah (I Sam. 2:1–10): fols. 120r-121r; Prayer of Hezekiah (Is. 38:10–20): fols. 121r-121v; Prayer of Manasseh (apocryphal): fols. 121v-122v; Song of Jonah (Jon. 2:3–10): fols. 122v-123r; First Song of the Three Youths in the Furnace (Dan 3: 28–45): fols. 123r-124r; Second Song of the Three Youths (Dan 3: 52–56): fols. 124r-124v; Third Song of the Three Youths (Dan 3: 57–88): fols. 124v-125r; Song of Habakkuk (Hab 3: 1–19): fols. 125v-126v; Song of Isaiah (Is 26: 9–20): fols. 126v-127r; Song of Our Lady Mary (Lk 1: 46–55): fols. 127v; Song of Zachariah (Lk 1: 68–79): fols. 127v-128r; Song of Simeon (Lk 2: 29–32): fol. 128r-128v

msItem.title: III) Mäḫalǝyä mäḫalǝy “The Song of Songs”
msItem.rubric:
Nomina sacra (name of St. Mary in Texts I-4, I-5); titles and numbers of the Pss., Canticles and Songs; title of Texts I-2, I-3 and I-5; title and incipit of the daily readings of Text I-4; name of the Hebrew letters in Ps. 118; letter እ in the word እስመ in Ps. 135; letters ስ and ሕ in the word ስብሕዎ in Ps. 148; letters ስ and ሕ in the word ስብሕዎ in Ps. 150; etters ባ and ክ of the word ይባርክዎ in Canticle 10; elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
A group of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1 and I-4.
msItem.incipit: Fol. 128v, l.5: ማኅልየ፡ ማኅልይ፡ ዝውእቱ፡ ዘሰሎሞን። ይስእመኒ፡ በስእመተ፡ አፉሁ፨ አዳም፡ አጥባተኪ[sic] ፡ እምወይን፨Song 1:1-2.
msItem.explicit: Fol. 134v, l.16: ጒይ፡ አንተ፡ ወልድ፡ እኁየ። ወተመሰለ[sic] ፡ ለወይጠል፨ ወከመ፡ ወሬዛ፡ ሀየል፡ ውስተ፡ አድባረ፡ ቤቴል፨Song 8-14.

listBibl.bibl: Uppsala O Etiop. 1 (16th cent.), fols. 212v-227r (LöfUpp 31, no. 4);
BritMus Orient. 12467 (1660), fols. 143r-151v (StrBritLib 23, no. 17 [s. also nos. 18-25]);
JRyM Ethiopian 5 (18th cent.), fols. 139r-146r (StrJRyM 7-9, no. 5 and pl. 8).

msItem.title: IV) Wǝddase Maryam “Praise of Mary”
msItem.rubric:
Nomina sacra (name of St. Mary in Texts I-4, I-5); titles and numbers of the Pss., Canticles and Songs; title of Texts I-2, I-3 and I-5; title and incipit of the daily readings of Text I-4; name of the Hebrew letters in Ps. 118; letter እ in the word እስመ in Ps. 135; letters ስ and ሕ in the word ስብሕዎ in Ps. 148; letters ስ and ሕ in the word ስብሕዎ in Ps. 150; etters ባ and ክ of the word ይባርክዎ in Canticle 10; elements of the punctuation signs and text dividers; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
A group of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1 and I-4.
msItem.incipit: Fol. 135ra, l.1: ውዳሴ፡ በሰኑይ። ፈቀደ፡ እግዚእ፡ ያግዕ[sic] ፡ ለአዳም፡ ኅዙነ፡ ወትኲዘ፡ ልብ፡ ወያግብኦ፡ ኀበ፡ ዘትካት፡ መንበሩ፨ ሰአ፡ ቅድስት፨[Fol. 135ra, l.1]: Praise on Monday. The Lord wished to liberate Adam, sad and aggrieved at heart, and reinstate him to his throne of old. Pr[ay for us], O Holy One!
msItem.explicit: Fol. 146vb, l.9: ያጽንዓነ፡ በርትዕት፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ውስተ፡ አሚነ፡ ዚአሁ፡ ወዘአቡሁ፡ ወዘቅዱስ፡ መንፈሱ፡ ይጸግወነ፡ ሣህሎ፤ ወምሕረቶ፤ ይሥረይ፡ ኃጢአተነ፡ በብዝኃ፡ ምሕረቱ፨ ስብሐት፡ ለኪ፡ ኦወላዲተ፡ እግዚአ፡ ኲሉ፡ አኰቴት፡ ወክብር፡ ለአብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ይእዜኒ፡ ወዘልፈኒ፡ ወለዓለመ፡ ዓለም፡ አሜን፨ ወአሜን። ለይኩን፡ ለይኩን፡ ወልድኪ፡ ሣህሎ፡ ይክፍለነ፡ ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት፨፨[Fol. 146vb, l.9]: May he strengthen us in the Orthodox faith, in the faith in himself, in his Father and in his Holy Spirit. May he bestow upon us his benevolence and his mercy; may he heal our sins by his abundant mercy. Praise be to you, O Mother of the Lord of all. Gratitude and glory be to the Father, the Son and the Holy Spirit, now and forever and unto the ages of ages. Amen and amen. May it be! May it be! May your Son bestow upon us from his benevolence. Pray for us, O Holy One!

listBibl.bibl: Uppsala O Etiop. 1 (16th cent.), fols. 231-251 (LöfUpp 32, n°4);
BritMus Orient. 12467 (1660), fols. 152r-161v (StrBritLib 23, n°17 [s. also nos. 18-25]);
JRyM Ethiopian 5 (18th cent.), fols. 146ra-158rb (StrJRyM 7-9, no. 5 and pl. 8)

msItem.note: Traditional interpretation of the Hebrew letters in Ps. 118 is missing.

supportDesc.condition: The front board attachement has been crudely repaired. The tailband is partly detached. Many fols. are stained with wax. Fol. 110 is damaged by fire (?); portions of Pss. 142 and 143 are destroyed. Fol. 129 is severely damaged by rodents. Part of text of Song 1 is destroyed or barely legible.

layout.note: Texts I-1, I-2, I-3: all data are for fol. 3r.
layout.ab: The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.

layout.note: Texts I-4, I-5: all data are for fol. 136r.
layout.ab: The upper line is written above the ruling.
The bottom line is written above the ruling.

list.item: Text I-3
እ፡ for እስመ፡ ለዓለም፡ ምሕረቱ፡ (Ps. 135, fols. 105v-106r)
ስ፡ for ስቡሕኒ᎓ ውእቱ᎓ ወልዑልኒ᎓ ውእቱ᎓ ለዓለም᎓ (Canticle 10, fols. 124v-125r)
Text I-4
ሰ፡ for ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት
Words or their abbreviations stand for the whole refrain:
ሠ፡/ሰ፡ for ሠረቀ፡ በሥጋ፡ እምድንግል፡ ዘእንበለ፡ ዘርአ፡ ብእሲ፡ ወአድኅነነ (fols. 135ra-va)
እ፡ for እስመ፡ በፈቃዱ፡ ወበሥምረቱ፡ አቡሁ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ መጽአ፡ ወአድኅነነ (fols. 135vb-136vb)
ኵ፡/ኵሉ፡ for ኵሉ፡ ትውልድ፡ ያስተበፅዑኪ፡ ለኪ፡ ለበሕቲትኪ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ (fols. 137rb-138rb)
ነዓ፡/ነዓብ፡ for ነዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ። እስመ፡ ሣህልኪ፡ ይኵን፡ ላዕለ፡ ኵልነ (fols. 139va-140ra)
ተ፡/ተፈ፡/ተፈሥ፡ for ተፈሥሒ፡ ኦምልዕልተ፡ ጸጋ፡ ተፈሥሒ፡ እስመ፡ ረከብኪ፡ ሞገስ፡ ተፈሥሒ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ምስሌኪ (fols. 141rb-142vb)
ነዓ፡ for ነዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ። እስመ፡ ሣህልኪ፡ ይኵን፡ ላዕለ፡ ኵልነ (fol. 142rb-vb)
Text I-5
ወ፡ ሣ፡ ይ፡ ሰ፡ ቅ፡ for ወልድኪ፡ ሣህሎ፡ ይክፈለነ፡ ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት
The abbreviations stand for the whole refrain:
ወ፡/ወበ፡/ወበእን፡ for ወበእንተዝ፡ ናዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ንጽሕት፡ ኵሎ፡ ጊዜ፡ ንስእል፡ ወናንቀዓዱ፡ ከመ፡ ንርከብ፡ ሣህለ፡ በኀበ፡ መፍቀሬ፡ ሰብእ (fols. 143vb-146va)

handDesc.handNote: Numeral ፮ “six” looks like compressed numeral ፯ “seven” (e.g., fols. 59r and 60r).

decoDesc.decoNote: Fol. 2r: elaborate coloured (red, black) ornamental band; geometric motifs.
Fol. 39v (after Ps. 50): elaborate coloured (red, black) ornamental band; geometric motifs.
Fol. 78v (after Ps. 100): elaborate coloured (red, black) ornamental band; geometric motifs.
Fol. 116r (after Text I-1): elaborate coloured (red, black) ornamental band; geometric motifs.
Fol. 128v: chain of nine dot asterisks between the end of “The Canticles of the Prophets” and the beginning of “The Song of Songs”
Fol. 134v (after Text I-3): elaborate coloured (red, black) ornamental band; geometric motifs, letters of Ethiopic syllabary.

list.item: Fol. 147r: Donation note.Fol. 147r: ዝዳዊት፡ ዘወሐበት፡ ወይዘሮ፡ ወለተ፡ ስላሴ፡ ወአቡሃ፡ ተስፋ፡ ማርያም፡ ወእማ፡ ወለተ፡ ሕይወት፡ ወብሲሐ[sic]፡ አርአያ፡ ስላሴ፡ ለመድሃኔ፡ አለም፡ አድግራት፡ አጋሜ፡ በዘመነ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ወንጌላዊ፡ ሕዳር፡ ፲፱ ቀን፡ ፲፱፻፳፰ አመተ፡ ምሕረት፡ ሻጪ፡ ቄስ፡ ደስታ፡ ገዛሃኝ፡ አድግራት፡ ገጂ፡ ሃለቃ፡ ክህሸን፡ ስንቄ፡ አድግራት፡ መድህን፡ ራሱ፡ አማኝ፡ ቄስ፡ ተክለ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ባደሩ፡ ሃለቃ፡ ገብረስላሴ፡ ሃለቃ፡ ተሰማ፡ ኪዳኑ፡ አድግራት፡ ዋጋው፡ ስምንት፡ ብር፡ ተጻፈ፡ በዘመነ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ፲፱፻፳፰ ዓመተ፡ ምህረት፡ ጥቅምት ፱ቀን Fol. 147r: This (is) the Psalter which wäyzaro Wälättä Sǝllase donated to Mädḫanä ʾAläm ʾAddǝgrat; and her father (is) Täsfa Maryam, and her mother Wälättä Ḥǝywät, and her husband ʾArʾaya Sǝllase; in the year of John the Evangelist, 19 Ḫǝdar 1928 year of mercy. The seller is priest Dästa Gäzzahäňň from ʾAddǝgrat, the purcheser is haläqa Kǝhšän Sǝnqe from ʾAddǝgrat, the guarantor is he himself, the witness is priest Täklä Haymanot Baddäru, haläqa Gäbräsǝllase, haläqa Täsämma Kidanu from ʾAddǝgrat. The price is eight Bǝrr. Written in the year of John, 1928 year of mercy, 9 Ṭǝqǝmt. The note is written in Amharic and Gǝʿǝz and is dated to 1928 year of mercy (= 1935 A.D.). It states that the donor is wäyzaro Wälättä Śǝllase for whom haläqa Kǝhšän Sǝnqe bought the Ms. from priest Dästa Gäzzahäňň for 8 Bǝrr. Also, the witnesses are mentioned.

Fol. 147v: Nicene Creed preceded by a short confession of fait, incomplete. Fol. 147va: እሰግድ፡ ለክብረ፡ መንግሥተ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስቅዱ[sic] ፡ እንዘ፡ ፩ ሰለስቱ፡ ወእንዘ፡ ሰለስቱ፡ ፩ … [fol. 147va] … ጸሎተ፡ ሃይማኖት፡ ነዓም[sic]፡ በ፩አምላክ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አብ፡ አሐዜ፡ ኵሉ፡ ዓለም፡ ገባሬ፡ ሰማያት፡ ወምድር፡ ዘያስተርኢ፡ ወዘኢያስተርኢ፡ ... [fol. 147vb] … ኮነ፡ ብእሴ፡ ወተሰቅለ፡ በእንቲአነ፡ በመዋዕለ፡ ጲላጦስ፡ ጰንጤናዊ፡ ሐመ፡ ወሞተ፡ ወተቀብረ፡ ወተንሥአ፡ ሙታን[sic]፡ አመ፡ ሣልሥት፡ በከመ፡ ጽሑፍ፡ ውስተ፡ ቅድሳት፡ መጻሕፍት፡ አርገ፡ በስብሐት፡ ውስተ፡ ሰማያት፡ ወነበረ፡ አቡሁ፡ ዳግመ፡ ይ...
The text is written in Gǝʿǝz with an admixture of Amharic words in the initial part. For the text of the Nicene Creed cp. MQ I, ch. 4, “Qǝddase śälästu mǝʾǝt”, §§ 1-10.

Fol. 149v: Excerpt from Mäḫalǝyä mäḫalǝy (“Song of Songs”, 3:11-4:5).
The text is written on a fol. which most probably was added later. The hand seems much later than the main hand.

- The title ዳዊት is written in green paint on the back board. - A directive concerning the time and purpose of reciting a Ps. or a Canticle is written near their title, in Amharic, in a secondary hand: e.g., fols. 3r(ጸላት፡ በተነሳ፡ ጊዜ፡ ደግ), 4v(በታመሙ፡ ጊዜ), 17r, 20v, 107r (ቤት፡ ስትሠሩ፡ ጊሄ፡ ድ), 116r. - The Psalms are divided into groups of ten separated by a chain of red and black dots. - Omitted letters, words or passages are written interlineally in a small script: fols. 5r, 12r, 41r, 43r, 48r, 51v, 55v, 57r, 63v, 66v, 70r, 76v, 77r, 85v, 100v, 117v, 119v, 121v, 122r, 123v, 141rb, 143r, - A donation or ownership note has been erased from fol. 147ra. - Cross, in pencil: fols. 67v, 130v, 131r. - Scribbles, doodles: fols. 1r, 148rv, 149rv.

binding.decoNote: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather; textile inlays. Two pairs of sewing stations.
Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.

projectDesc.p: Encoded according to TEI P5 Guidelines.

person.persName: According to Additio 1, the Ms. was donated by wäyzäro Wälättä Śǝllase.

revisionDesc.change: transformed from mycore to TEI P5
